2.「たすけて～！| 誰か いるの？| おねがい！ ここから 出して～！: Help me! Is anyone there? Please! Get me out|of here!

7.「ぷるぷる……。このまま ずーっと| くらくて こわいままかと思ったよぅ。: Plump... I thought I'd be stuck here|forever...

11.「わたくしは リナーシェと申します。| 天星郷に招かれた者の ひとりですわ。|: My name is Rinache... I am one of those who|have been invited into the land of the|stars... You are one of them, aren't you?

12.「……当代の 勇者の盟友 <pc>さま。| その高潔なお心と 堂々たる たたずま: An ally of the bravest men of our time<pc> I'm so proud of you. I'm sure you'll agree|that his noble heart and imposing stance...

That's very kind of you... If I've been of|use to you, Lord Rinaldi, then even if I'm|not, I've been invited to Heaven's Star Land|
|for a reason.

34.「……いいだろう。| 紺碧の試練は きわめて 明快。| 我が定めし 番人と戦い: ... Good... The azure ordeal is the|greatest... I have chosen to fight the|Watchman, and if I can defeat him...

|angel!
